PERSONA.NAME: King John
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: King of Britain, father to Prince Henry, son of Queen Elinor and Henry II. Orders his nephew's murder and defies Rome.

PERSONA.NAME: Prince Henry
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to King John, later Henry III.

PERSONA.NAME: Arthur
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Duke of Britain, nephew to the King, son to Constance and Geoffrey (King John's older brother). Dies trying to escape.

PERSONA.NAME: Earl of Pembroke
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Rebels against King John but later repents.

PERSONA.NAME: Earl of Salisbury
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Rebels against King John but later repents.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Bigot
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Rebels against King John but later repents.

PERSONA.NAME: Hubert de Burgh
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A politician from Angiers, ordered by King John to murder Arthur.

PERSONA.NAME: Robert Faulconbridge
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son of Sir Robert Faulconbridge, half-brother to Philip

PERSONA.NAME: Philip the Bastard
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Also called Richard, half-brother to Robert and illegitimate son of Richard the Lionheart and Lady Faulconbridge.

PERSONA.NAME: James Gurney
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Servant to Lady Faulconbridge

PERSONA.NAME: Peter of Pomfret
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A prophet, later hanged for predicting the downfall of King John.

PERSONA.NAME: Philip, King of France
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Also called Philip II, supports Arthur's claim to the throne.

PERSONA.NAME: Lewis
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The Dauphin, marries John's niece (Blanche) and later invades England.

PERSONA.NAME: Lymoges, Duke of Austria
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Duke of Austria, killed Richard the Lionheart, later killed by Philip the Bastard.

PERSONA.NAME: Cardinal Pandulph
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The Pope's legate, convinces Lewis to invade England.

PERSONA.NAME: Melune
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A French lord wounded in battle.

PERSONA.NAME: Chatillion
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Ambassador from France to King John

PERSONA.NAME: Queen Elinor
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Widow of Henry II, mother to King John

PERSONA.NAME: Constance
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Widow of Geoffrey (John's elder brother), mother to Arthur

PERSONA.NAME: Blanch of Spain
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Daughter to the King of Castile, niece to King John, later marries the Dauphin

PERSONA.NAME: Lady Faulconbridge
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Widow to Sir Robert Faulconbridge, mother to Philip the Bastard.
